languages.text: {n}Равор кривится, отчего гримаса на его лице становится еще уродливее.{/n} "Я это... Я вам чем не угодил, Лорд-капитан?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"
languages.original_text: {n}Равор кривится, отчего гримаса на его лице становится еще уродливее.{/n} "Я это... Я вам чем не угодил, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "I, er... Where have I wronged you, Lord Cap'n?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "I, er... Where have I wronged you, Lord Cap'n?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "I, er... Where have I wronged you, Lord Cap'n?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "I, er... Where have I wronged you, Lord Cap'n?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"
{n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

languages.text: {n}雷沃的眼睛抽搐了一下，脸上的表情变得更难看了。{/n}“我……我是不是干了什么事情，让你不高兴了，船长老大？”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃的眼睛抽搐了一下，脸上的表情变得更难看了。{/n}“我……我是不是干了什么事情，让你不高兴了，船长老大？”

languages.text: {n}El ojo de Ravor se mueve como por un tic, lo que hace que su mueca sea aún más espantosa.{/n} «He... ¿He hecho algo que le desagrade, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi?».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El ojo de Ravor se mueve como por un tic, lo que hace que su mueca sea aún más espantosa.{/n} «He... ¿He hecho algo que le desagrade, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi?».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアの目がピクピクと動き、その険しい表情をさをさらに際立たせる。{/n}「その…何か機嫌を損ねるようなことをしたでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアの目がピクピクと動き、その顔の醜さをさらに際立たせる。{/n}「その…何か機嫌を損ねるようなことをしたでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」

languages.text: {n}Ravors Auge zuckt, was die Grimasse auf seinem Gesicht noch hässlicher erscheinen lässt.{/n}"Hab ... Hab ich Euch irgendwie verärgert, Lord Cap'n?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravors Auge zuckt, was die Grimasse auf seinem Gesicht noch hässlicher erscheinen lässt.{/n}"Hab ... Hab ich Euch irgendwie verärgert, Lord Cap'n?"

languages.text: {n}L'œil de Ravor se met à trembler, ce qui ne fait qu'aggraver la laideur de sa grimace.{/n} « J'ai... J'ai fait quelque chose de mal, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'œil de Ravor se met à trembler, ce qui ne fait qu'aggraver la laideur de sa grimace.{/n} « J'ai... J'ai fait quelque chose de mal, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine} ? »

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un gözü seğiriyor, bu yüzden de asık suratı daha da çirkinleşiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ın hoşuna gitmeyen bir şey mi yaptım?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor's eye twitches, which makes the grimace on his face even uglier.{/n} "'Ave... 'Ave I done something to displease the Lord Cap'n?"
